steps.title: Call or Book Online
steps.description: Reach out to us via phone or easily book your dumpster rental online. Tell us about your project, including the type of waste and the dumpster size you need.

steps.title: Choose the Right Dumpster
steps.description: Our team will guide you through choosing the right dumpster size for your project, whether it's a small residential clean-up or a large construction site.

steps.title: Quick and Convenient Delivery
steps.description: Once you confirm your order, we’ll schedule a same-day delivery or arrange a convenient time that fits your schedule.

steps.title: Schedule Your Pickup - We're Just a Call Away!
steps.description: Once the dumpster is delivered, simply load it with your project’s waste, whether it's debris from home renovations, yard waste, or construction materials.

steps.title: Easy Pickup and Disposal
steps.description: When you’re done, give us a call, and we’ll schedule prompt, hassle-free pick-up at a time that’s convenient for you.

steps.title: Final Invoice
steps.description: After your dumpster is picked up, you’ll receive a clear, itemized invoice based on the exact size and rental period. There are no hidden fees, and the process is 100% transparent.
